name: RobAuto
description:
🎮 Ludum Dare 47 - Theme: Stuck in a Loop

Move your character with WASD.

Your goal is to help your little robot friends get to their respective goals (marked with ☑️)

But your robot friends are stuck in a behavior loop: they each have a predefined action loop.

You can alter their trajectory by preventing them from doing specific actions, like blocking a down move so they don't get stuck.

**There is no menu, quit with ESC**
